message:
We play with several 32 piece card sets from 7 to 10, boy (2 points), queen (3 points), king (4 points) and ace (11 points).

You can draw as many cards as you want. After each draw you can decide to draw another card or stop. You loose if you have drawn more than 21 points.
	

After you stop the dealer will draw following the same rules. You win if you have more points as the dealer otherwise you loose.
You have 22 points. You overdraw and loose.
You have 23 points. You overdraw and loose.
You have 24 points. You overdraw and loose.
You have 25 points. You overdraw and loose.
You have 26 points. You overdraw and loose.
You have 27 points. You overdraw and loose.
You have 28 points. You overdraw and loose.
You have 29 points. You overdraw and loose.
You have 30 points. You overdraw and loose.
You have 31 points. You overdraw and loose.
You have 32 points. You overdraw and loose.
The keeper has 15 points. You loose.
The keeper has 16 points. You loose.
The keeper has 17 points. You loose.
The keeper has 18 points. You loose.
The keeper has 19 points. You loose.
The keeper has 20 points. You loose.
The keeper has 21 points. You loose.
